channel.title: Chicago Mutual Aid Requests
channel.description: Emma's list of Chicago Mutual Aid Requests

item.title: Monetary donations needed: holiday gifts for children
item.description: Via Irving Park Food Pantry. The Irving Park Food Pantry will be providing holiday gifts to children under 12 at their holiday meal distribution on Dec. 18th. You can give money directly or buy items from their Amazon wishlist. Link to more info.

item.title: Monetary donations needed: holiday gift drive
item.description: Via Chinese Mutual Aid Association. Asking for monetary donations before Dec. 6th to buy holiday gifts for immigrant students in CMAA's after school program. Link to more info.

item.title: Items needed: winter clothing
item.description: Via Humboldt Park Solidarity Network. Asking for (clean, all ages/genders) coats, jackets, gloves, mittens, hats, blankets, sweaters, hoodies, socks, scarves, and hand warmers. Donations accepted from now until spring. To be distributed at the Casa Hernandez free store. Link to more info.

item.title: Items needed: Winter clothing, sweatpants, shoes
item.description: Via Trash People of Logan Square. Asking for men's shoes (especially sneakers and winter boots), sweatpants (all genders), and winter coats/accessories (all ages and genders). Items will go to a variety of community organizations for distribution. Link to more info.

item.title: Items needed: grocery carts, women's underwear
item.description: Via Edgewater Mutual Aid Network. Asking for grocery carts and women's underwear (new, all sizes). Contact info for arranging a pick-up/drop-off can be found at the link. Link to more info.

item.title: Monetary donations needed: educational programming for incarcerated people
item.description: Via Prison + Neighborhood Arts/Education Project. PNAP is running a winter supply drive to raise money for their educational programming at Hill and Logan Correctional Center. They're aiming to raise $5,000 by Dec. 25, which will cover class supplies, faculty travel costs, books, etc. Link to more info.

item.title: Items needed: stroller, backpack, stuffed animals
item.description: Via Edgewater Mutual Aid Network. Asking for donations of a newborn stroller, lightly used camping backpack, and stuffed animals. Contact info to arrange a pick-up/drop-off is at the link. Link to more info.

item.title: Items needed: strollers, car seat, grocery cart, backpack
item.description: Via Edgewater Mutual Aid Network. Asking for donations of a newborn stroller, infant stroller, infant car seat (5 months) with base, small grocery cart, and lightly used camping backpack. Only items in good repair. Contact EMAN at the email/phone number at the link to arrange a pick-up or drop-off of items. Link to more info.

item.title: Items needed: canned food and non-perishables
item.description: Via The Orange Tent Project. Asking for canned foods, rice, pasta, instant oatmeal, peanut butter, crackers, granola bars, chili powder, ground cumin, salt & pepper. Drop off donations Nov 1-30, locations listed at link. Items will be distributed to recently-housed neighbors. Link to more info.

item.title: Items needed: winterwear, snacks, ventra cards, and more
item.description: Via Chicago Community Jail Support. Asking for donations of coats (size L-3XL), thick hoodies, thick sweaters, hand warmers, gloves, winter hats, warm calf/knee-length socks, newport cigarettes, individual chip packs, beef jerky, fruit snacks, chewy granola bars, gatorade bottles, water bottles/cans, single-ride ventra cards. Link to more info.
